```{r setup, include=FALSE}
  knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
  library(fivethirtyeight)
  library(tidyverse)
  library(ggplot2)
  library(ggthemes)
```

Find avg age per year by party:
```{r}
data("congress_age")

congress_age %>% 
  mutate(year = format(termstart, "%Y")) %>%
  filter(party %in% c("R", "D")) %>% 
  group_by(year, party) %>%
  summarize(average = mean(age)) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=year, y=average, group=party, color=party)) + geom_line() + labs(title = "Average Age of Members of Congress", subtitle = "At start of term, 1947-2013", source = "538 R Package") + theme_fivethirtyeight() + scale_color_fivethirtyeight()

```
